name: Priya Sharma
text: IAT Technologies transformed my career completely. The practical approach and industry-relevant curriculum helped me land my dream job at TCS. The instructors are amazing!

name: Rajesh Kumar
text: The Data Science course was exceptional. Real projects, hands-on experience, and excellent placement support. I got placed at Infosys with a great package!

name: Anitha Reddy
text: Best investment I ever made! The digital marketing course is comprehensive and up-to-date. Now working at Flipkart thanks to IAT Technologies.

name: Vikram Singh
text: The AWS course at IAT is fantastic. Practical labs, real-world scenarios, and excellent support. Landed a cloud architect role at Amazon!

name: Meera Patel
text: IAT's cybersecurity program is top-notch. The hands-on approach to ethical hacking and security analysis prepared me perfectly for my role at Microsoft.
